issue.title: [R] Update strptime bindings to use tz
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16415](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16415). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`strptime` mentions it does not support `tz` - the timezone argument. ARROW-12820 has been addressed and the binding definition need updating.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16415?focusedCommentId=17550969) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13190
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13190>
